attestMilestone(bytes32).details: Only trustees or designated attesters can call

cancelDistribution(uint256).details: Only callable by trustee, refunds unclaimed funds to caller

createClaimableDistribution(address,addr.details: Transfers paymentToken from caller to this contract      Beneficiaries claim based on their token balance

params.totalAmount: Total amount to distribute (0 = use percentage share)

params.beneficiary: Beneficiary who can claim on achievement

returns.amount: Claimable amount (0 if already claimed or not eligible)

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

attestMilestone(bytes32).notice: Attest that a milestone has been achieved

cancelDistribution(uint256).notice: Cancel a distribution and refund remaining funds

claimAllDistributions(address).notice: Claim all pending distributions for caller

claimMilestoneDistribution(bytes32).notice: Claim distribution for an achieved milestone

createDistributionSchedule(address,uint2.notice: Create a vesting distribution schedule for a beneficiary

createMilestone(address,string,uint256).notice: Create a milestone for conditional distribution

getClaimableAmount(uint256,address).notice: Get claimable amount for a beneficiary

getDistributionSchedule(address).notice: Get distribution schedule for a beneficiary

getTotalDistributedTo(address).notice: Get total distributions to a beneficiary

getVestedAmounts(address).notice: Calculate vested amount available for release

hasClaimed(uint256,address).notice: Check if beneficiary has claimed a distribution

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

releaseVestedAmount(address).notice: Release vested amount to a beneficiary
